metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2860 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in the SR-IPv6 implementationin the Linux kernel. The flaw exists within the processing of seg6attributes. The issue results from the improper validation of user-supplieddata, which can result in a read past the end of an allocated buffer. Thisflaw allows a privileged local user to disclose sensitive information onaffected installations of the Linux kernel.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-201.212
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-201.212
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-201.212
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-201.212
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-201.212
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-136.153~18.04.1
